# Format definitions
#   Kind = Healing | Support | Summon | Attack | Supply
#
# Basic spell:
#   Name/Spell/Mana/Kind
#       Intense Healing/exura gran/70/Healing
#
#   Name/Spell/Mana/Kind[/Wave/Expansion]
#       Fire Wave/exevo flam hur/25/Attack/Wave/0,1,1,2
#       Terra Wave/exevo tera hur/210/Attack/Wave/0,0,1,1,1
#       Great Energy Beam/exevo gran vis lux/110/Attack/Wave/0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0
#       Energy Strike/exori vis/20/Attack/Wave/0
#
#   Name/Spell/Mana/Kind[/Area/Center/Range/Radius]
#       Mass Healing/exura gran mas res/150/Healing/Area/Self/0/3
#       Fierce Berserk/exori gran/340/Attack/Area/Self/0/1
#       Energy Strike/exori vis/20/Attack/Area/Target/3/0
#
# Basic rune:
#   Name/ID/Kind[/Area-Definition]
#       Ultimate Healing Rune/3160/Healing
